name: Eldeth Merryweather
appearance: Weathered captain with a sharp gaze and a sea-green coat.
backstory: Long-time captain of the Silver Gull, famed for fair prices and safe passage.
additional_traits: Sea Legs: Advantage on checks to keep balance aboard a ship.
Trusted Captain: Dockmasters sometimes waive minor fees.

name: Nox
appearance: Broad-shouldered bugbear first mate, keeps order with few words.
backstory: Swore loyalty to Eldeth after she saved his crew from pirates.

name: Varnin Steamaxle
appearance: Relatively scrawny for a dwarf, but still objectively muscular. Wears glasses in order to appear more sophisticated and invoke trust with the upper class.
backstory: The Steamaxle family has has long been in the business of transport and carriage rental to the Port of Virellon, particularly for the nobility and upper class (this is what they built their brand on). They, despite having long-standing ties with these sort of families, could never break into the upper class. Recently they have fallen on hard times due to the influx of commoners travelling through Port Virellon, resulting in fewer nobles taking this route.

name: Dull the Hobgoblin
appearance: A huge, heavy set hobgoblin with scars around his ankles. Leader of the Rusttooth Raiders.
additional_traits: Nectroic Rebuke: After being attacked, Dull can use a reaction to cast Necrotic Rebuke at the attacker (DC 13).
